title: HBL2HBC
author: FIX94
description: Boot from HBL to HBC or app
details:
Boot to your vwii Homebrew Channel or

  	add a config file hbl2hbc.txt where you can add TitleID=TileName lines to then choose from in a small menu if that config is on your sd card root, if no config is found it will just launch the homebrew channel by default like v1.0
-if the config file provided only contains one title id boot that directly, no need to display a selection menu for that

  	config
